EnronTahitiare the transaction documents for Project Tahiti Each of the documents is marked to show revisions against the version circulated last Wednesday August As we discussed on the phone we have incorporated the business agreement reached between CIBC and Enron as follows The Tahiti Series Trust Agreement has been revised to require the consent of all certificateholders which includes Fiji Z LLC which can only consent with the consent of its Class B Member CIBC prior to i the creation of any series after December see definition of Series Supplement and ii making any amendments to the purpose provision which specifically limits the purposes of the Trust to holding Trust Property defined as the warrants or the definition of Series Supplement The Subscription Agreement has been revised to provide that CIBCs commitment to fund on December will be terminated if the Bali Trust receives any funds except in connection with the issuance of debt of the Bali Trust which would require the consent of CIBC as the beneficial owner or funds received from CIBC Please be aware that because of the revisions described above it was not necessary to incorporate all of Tim Elwoods comments received September The documents in WordPerfect format are identified as follows Closing Checklist Trust Agreement of Tahiti Beneficial Interest Certificate Series Supplement Creating Series Z Tahiti Series Z Certificate issued to Fiji Z Warrant Assignemtn Promissory Note from Tahiti Direction Letter to Owner Trustee of Tahiti Amended and Restated LLC Agreement of Fiji Z LLC Promissory Note from Fiji to Tahiti Amended and Restated LLC Agreement of Bora Bora Promissory Note from Bora Bora to Fiji Sale and Auction Agreement Independent Auctioneer Letter Agmt B Interest Assignment AGmt Assignment of Bali Promissory Note to Fiji Trust Agreement of Bali Reimbursement and Disclosure Agreement Promissory Note from Bali to Bora Bora Certificate Distribution Agreement Subscription Documents Certificate Interest Certificate to CIBC and Direction Letter to Owner Trustee of Bali If you have any questions please call Muriel McFarling at Chris Krecek SecretaryLegal Assistant Andrews Kurth LLP Main Street Suite Dallas Texas Phone Fax Email CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email including any attachments is confidential legally privileged and intended only for the use of each recipient named above If you are not an intended recipient you must not read use or disseminate this information If you have received this email in error please notify the sender immediately by reply email and delete this email from your computer VIRUS WARNING Although this email including any attachments is not intended to contain any virus or defect that may affect your computer you are responsible for ensuring that no virus or defect exists The sender disclaims any responsibility for any loss or damages arising from any virus or defect associated with this email wpd wpd wpd wpd wpd
